Armoured Ceramite.description: Supplemental ceramite armour packages provide protection far beyond stock configurations while also adding significant weight to the chassis.

Artificer Hull.description: Replacing numerous structural components and armour plates with thrice-blessed replacements, the vehicleâ€™s hull is upgraded to be a rare work of mechanical art by master artificers.

Dozer Blades.description: An attachment for the front of vehicles, useful for clearing difficult terrain and can be used as an improvised weapon.

Frag Assault Launchers.description: These launchers enable a vehicle to clear an area for its loaded troops, or prevent boarding by an enemy at close range.

Heavy Armour.description: Simple but effective, extra armour plates can be attached to most vehicles to provide extra protection.

Lucifer Pattern Engine.description: An advanced engine that increases tactical flexibility by enabling more options for movement and faster repositioning.

Searchlight.description: A simple solution for fighting in dark environments, searchlights serve to illuminate enemies for ease of targeting.

Smoke Launchers.description: Useful for providing concealment in open terrain, these launchers project wide-spectrum concealing smoke to prevent accurate targeting of the vehicle.

Void Shield.description: An advanced shield capable of providing extreme protection to heavy vehicles.
